name: Rapid Grappler
text: You are a quick hand at grappling.
prerequisites: Dex 13, Greater Grapple, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +9 or monk level 9th.
benefit: Whenever you use Greater Grapple to successfully maintain a grapple as a move action, you can then spend a swift action to make a grapple combat maneuver check at a -5 penalty.
staminaText: You can spend 2 stamina points to gain a +2 bonus on a grapple check made as a swift action with this feat.
prerequisites_zh: 敏捷13，高等擒抱，精通擒抱，精通徒手打击，BAB+9或武僧9级。
benefit_zh: 当你成功地使用“高等擒抱”以移动动作维持了一次擒抱之后，接下来你只用迅捷动作就可以以承受-5减值进行维持擒抱的战技检定。
staminaText_zh: 你可以使用2点耐力来在使用这个专长时以迅捷动作做出的擒抱检定上获得+2加值。
